articles.author: Chris Wright
articles.title: Best soccer images of 2021: Messi's joy, tears, then joy again
articles.description: With 2022 on the horizon, it is a chance to take stock and look back at the past year. Here are the best images of 2021, as chosen by Getty and AFP.
articles.content:
As 2022 looms large on the horizon it is a timely opportunity to stop for a moment, take stock and look back at the year just gone.
